'''Cool It!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Elemental Specialist]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to keep an opponent [[Frozen]] for over ten seconds (one time).

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name comes from one of [[Kaeya]]'s [[Kaeya/Voice-Overs|voice-overs]] that may play upon using his [[Frostgnaw|Elemental Skill]].
